title: Citi Celebrates 109 Years in Panama
summary: Panama City - After marking its 200th anniversary at the global level, Citi is now celebrating 109 years in Panama. Present in the country since 1904, Citi opened its first affiliate outside of the United States there as the International Banking Corporation. Today, Citi leads the cash management, FX, derivatives, electronic banking and public sector solutions markets.
tag-3: Panama City – After marking its 200th anniversary at the global level, Citi is now celebrating 109 years in Panama. Present in the country since 1904, Citi opened its first affiliate outside of the United States there as the International Banking Corporation. Today, Citi leads the cash management, FX, derivatives, electronic banking and public sector solutions markets.
tag-4: In terms of products, Citibank is tops in transactional banking and a leader in the multinational, railroad and maritime sectors, as well as in the retail banking credit card segment.
tag-5: Like its parent company at the global level, Citi Panama has facilitated some of the world's most transformative projects. Since financing the construction of the Panama Canal 109 years ago, the bank has contributed continuously to Panama's growth and transformation in projects such as country's first Metro line.
tag-6: "Citi collaborates with economic growth and development, taking advantage of its global network and experience to help build a better future for our clients and the communities where we work," Panama CCO Raymond Gatcliffe noted. "We are proud to have been part of Panama's history for the last 109 years."
tag-7: Through the Citi Foundation, Citi Panama also participates in a range of initiatives dedicated to fostering entrepreneurship, micro enterprise and micro finance, with the goal of furthering the prosperity and sustainability of the Panamanian economy.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
